alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Sitka (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 1:59AM AKST until February 13 at 1:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS MOVING ONSHORE MONDAY MORNING... Temperatures will cool through the morning and allow rain to change to all snow and start accumulating. If snow showers train over one area for an extended period of time, then greater accumulations are possible. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Pelican, Sitka, and Juneau. * WHEN...Until 1 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snow accumulations for Juneau expected north of the airport and out the road.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Sitka
